title: Walmart reaps the benefit of the cloud
text:
Walmart reaps the benefit of the cloud 10:39am GMT - 01:59 
The world's biggest brick-and-mortar retailer, Walmart, is taking a page from Amazon's playbook to boost its online sales. It's turning to the cloud. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The world's biggest brick-and-mortar retailer, Walmart, is taking a page from Amazon's playbook to boost its online sales. It's turning to the cloud. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EHZbIs
